Package com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js

These are the classes that use JavaSound to manipulate MIDI files, create MIDI data, and play them.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MIDIEventFilter
    interface MIDIEventFilter
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleReceiver
    A JavaSound receiver that prints to stdout.
    Instrument
    Instruments contain a GM patch, and a range.
    KeySignature
    Data follows MIDI file format for key signatures.
    MIDIControllers
    Class MIDIControllers helps you work with MIDI control messages.
    MIDIEvent
    Class MIDIEvent wraps and adds to Java Sound's MidiEvent class.
    MIDINote  
    MIDINoteBuilder  
    MIDIPerformer
    You can play a single Sequence,Track, or Score with play.
    MIDISender
    Shoves data directly to a channel on a device.
    MIDITrack
    A collection of MIDINotes and MIDIEvents along with a pile of things you can do to them A rewrite of my ancient MIDITrack and MIDINoteList from the 1990s.
    MIDITrackBuilder
    Decided in this case to not make it a static inner class.
    MIDITrackFactory  
    MIDITrackUtils  
    MIDIUtils
    Class MidiUtils is a collection of, um, MIDI utilities.
    Score
    A Score instance represents a standard MIDI file format 1.
    ScoreFactory  
    TimeSignature
    Serializable in order to DnD notelists.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    WTFException  

Package com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js Description

These are the classes that use JavaSound to manipulate MIDI files, create MIDI data, and play them.
